title: Subs not seeing their board?
message: Firebot's auto grouping functionality requires a chat connection to see viewer roles. Make sure to connect to both. The event log will let you know when the auto grouper starts up.

title: Command Trigger Behavior Change
message: <div>As of v4.4.5, chat command trigger behavior has been changed. It is no longer assumed that a command starts with
, instead triggers are considered exactly how they are saved. Please update your current commands to include a
(or whatever you want) in their triggers.
